abilities.title: The Powers of a Psi-Healer
abilities.description:
1. Psionic Powers: Starts with deaden pain, exorcism, healing touch, increased healing, psychic diagnosis, psychic purification, psychic surgery, see aura, empathy. +1 healing/physical power/level (2nd+).
2. I.S.P.: M.E. base + 2D6x10 + 10/level. Master psionic.
3. P.P.E.: 2D6 base.
4. Bonuses: Save vs psionic 10+ (M.E. bonus), +4 vs mind control (drugs/potions/charms), +4 vs poisons/disease, +7 vs possession, +12% vs coma, +2 vs horror factor.
